channel.title: Canada wins gold in mens hockey
channel.description: So America, how does it feel to lose in the gold medal game? ;D

item.title: Canada wins gold in mens hockey
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:20, topic:331398”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=427777.msg3141645#msg3141645 date=1267600663]

[quote author=Uriko link=topic=427777.msg3141241#msg3141241 date=1267553467]

Gz, we all knew Canada would win in the first place though. America is completely worthless when it comes to hockey. Oh god do i miss the good ol’ days of Sweden, Russia, Czek Republic, Finland and Canada being da top contenders…
[/quote]they came in 2nd… beat ur stupid ass country…
[/quote]Cus Sweden sux with the new line-up. Hockey sux thesedays cos the old team members rnt around.

be more of a bandwagon fan[/quote]wut???

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:12, topic:331398”]If ure talking about icehockey i watched the game… America got owned lol…

Canada had 3 players on at one point and america had 5… And they still couldnt get near the goal.[/quote]
You’ve got to be kidding. America came back after trailing 2-0.

Gz, we all knew Canada would win in the first place though. America is completely worthless when it comes to hockey. Oh god do i miss the good ol’ days of Sweden, Russia, Czek Republic, Finland and Canada being da top contenders…

item.title: Canada wins gold in mens hockey
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:8, topic:331398”]. . .

Hockey was made from fails.

I could really care less because caring about sports is completely retarded.[/quote]yes, trial and error. cool, just like everything else in the world.

[quote=“jme, post:9, topic:331398”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=427777.msg3141200#msg3141200 date=1267546174]
Gz, we all knew Canada would win in the first place though. America is completely worthless when it comes to hockey. Oh god do i miss the good ol’ days of Sweden, Russia, Czek Republic, Finland and Canada being da top contenders…
[/quote]

USA has a better team imo

Amazing game though. I couldnt even eat at the end, was gonna puke it was so intense.[/quote]crosby

item.title: Canada wins gold in mens hockey
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

It was to cold in Canada for golf, so they played it on ice.

The golf club head was to small so they made it a huge flat surface.

The ball kept rolling so they made it a cylinder.

They couldn’t make it into a small hole so they replaced it with a soccer net.

Hockey was made from fails.

I could really care less because caring about sports is completely retarded.

Read full topic
